name: texel_antialiasing
author: Nestorboy
description: Adds anti-aliasing between texels in the model preview.

blockbenchConfig.title: Texel Anti-Aliasing
blockbenchConfig.author: Nestorboy
blockbenchConfig.description: Adds anti-aliasing between texels in the model preview.
blockbenchConfig.about:
This plugin aims to improve the visual fidelity of the preview models by adding some anti-aliasing between texels.

The anti-aliasing method is heavily inspired by t3ssel8r's video ["Crafting a Better Shader for Pixel Art Upscaling"](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d6tp43wZqps).
